price: 17. Tokkel is isi maraa kee isi fanat tet qellisa reebu haysitte Qibaada abta waqdi tet able waanamkeh, tokkel jibriil deqsita ni malaykattu tet fanah rubneeh gino как dudda-le seehadaytih weelot weeloysimmi iyyeh teetih yemeete.
arabic: فَٱتَّخَذَتۡ مِن دُونِهِمۡ حِجَابٗا فَأَرۡسَلۡنَآ إِلَيۡهَا رُوحَنَا فَتَمَثَّلَ لَهَا بَشَرٗا سَوِيّٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: fa-ittakhadhat min dūnihim ḥijāban fa-arsalnā ilayhā rūḥanā fatamathala lahā basharan sawiyyan
translations: then he assumed for her the likeness
then he assumed for her the likeness
